languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Охотник за головами{/g} совершает одновременно несколько атак в количестве, равном числу врагов с эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} в бою. Эти атаки равномерно распределяются между всей добычей в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} охотника за головами. Они всегда достигают цели, а {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} всегда является {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Hunter simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of prey in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Hunter's line of sight. The attacks always hit and always score critical hits.

The Hunter simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of prey in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Hunter's line of sight. The attacks always hit and always score critical hits.

The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Охотник совершает одновременно несколько атак в количестве, равном числу врагов с эффектом "добыча" в бою. Эти атаки равномерно распределяются между всей добычей в зоне видимости охотника. Они всегда достигают цели, а попадание всегда является критическим.

Охотник совершает одновременно несколько атак в количестве, равном числу врагов с эффектом "добыча" в бою. Эти атаки равномерно распределяются между всей добычей в зоне видимости охотника. Они всегда достигают цели, а попадание всегда является критическим.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}同时发动多次攻击，攻击次数等同于战场上{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的数量。赏金猎人的攻击会平均分配给赏金猎人{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的所有猎物。所有攻击都必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，而且必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}伤害。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}同时发动多次攻击，攻击次数等同于战场上{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的数量。赏金猎人的攻击会平均分配给赏金猎人{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的所有猎物。所有攻击都必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，而且必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}伤害。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} efectúa varios ataques simultáneos. La cantidad de ataques es igual al número de {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presas{/g} que haya en el combate. Estos ataques se reparten equitativamente entre todas las presas que estén dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del cazarrecompensas. Los ataques siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} y siempre son {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} efectúa varios ataques simultáneos. La cantidad de ataques es igual al número de {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presas{/g} que haya en el combate. Estos ataques se reparten equitativamente entre todas las presas que estén dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del cazarrecompensas. Los ataques siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} y siempre son {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} führt gleichzeitig mehrere Angriffe aus. Die Anzahl der Angriffe ist gleich der Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} im Kampf. Diese Angriffe werden gleichmäßig auf sämtliche Beute in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers aufgeteilt. Die Angriffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} immer und führen immer zu {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffern{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} führt gleichzeitig mehrere Angriffe aus. Die Anzahl der Angriffe ist gleich der Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} im Kampf. Diese Angriffe werden gleichmäßig auf sämtliche Beute in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers aufgeteilt. Die Angriffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} immer und führen immer zu {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffern{/g}.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} lance plusieurs attaques simultanées. Le nombre d'attaques est égal au nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proies{/g} disponibles au combat. Ces attaques sont réparties équitablement entre toutes les proies dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} du chasseur de primes. Les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchent{/g} toujours leur cible et portent systématiquement un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Chasseur lance plusieurs attaques simultanées. Le nombre d'attaques est égal au nombre de proies disponibles au combat. Ces attaques sont réparties équitablement entre toutes les proies situées dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} du Chasseur. Les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}atteignent{/g} toujours leur cible et portent systématiquement un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が連続で複数回の攻撃を行う。攻撃回数は戦闘中の{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}の数に等しい。これらの攻撃は、バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}のすべての獲物に等しく分割される。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ハンターが連続で複数回の攻撃を行う。攻撃回数は戦闘中の獲物の数に等しい。これらの攻撃は、ハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}のすべての獲物に等しく分割される。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。
